label: LHGH PDF Tools
description: Provides actions for performing PDF operations
PDFtoImage.label: Extract PDF Images
PDFtoImage.description: Extracts All Image Objects from PDF
PDFtoImage.return_label: Select list variable to save generated file paths
PDFtoImage.inputFile.label: Select a PDF for extraction
PDFtoImage.outputType.label: Output Image File Format Type
PDFtoImage.outputLocation.label: Output folder path
PDFtoImage.outputLocation.description: If empty, file will be saved to same location as input file
PDFtoImage.colorFormat.label: Target Color Format
PDFtoImage.colorFormat.description: This is the format of the output file, color is not added if not present in original
